ChangeList.Description: Added the [privateEndpointConnection](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/privateEndpointConnection?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type.
Added the **privateLinkResourcePolicies** relationship to the [policyRoot](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/policyRoot?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the [privateLinkResourcePolicy](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/privateLinkResourcePolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type.
Removed the **description** property from the [unifiedRoleDefinition](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/unifiedRoleDefinition?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **displayName** property from the [unifiedRoleDefinition](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/unifiedRoleDefinition?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **id** property from the [unifiedRoleDefinition](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/unifiedRoleDefinition?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **isBuiltIn** property from the [unifiedRoleDefinition](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/unifiedRoleDefinition?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **isEnabled** property from the [unifiedRoleDefinition](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/unifiedRoleDefinition?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **resourceScopes** property from the [unifiedRoleDefinition](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/unifiedRoleDefinition?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **rolePermissions** property from the [unifiedRoleDefinition](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/unifiedRoleDefinition?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **templateId** property from the [unifiedRoleDefinition](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/unifiedRoleDefinition?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **version** property from the [unifiedRoleDefinition](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/unifiedRoleDefinition?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **inheritsPermissionsFrom** relationship from the [unifiedRoleDefinition](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/unifiedRoleDefinition?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **id** property from the [unifiedRoleAssignment](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/unifiedRoleAssignment?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **appScopeId** property from the [unifiedRoleAssignment](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/unifiedRoleAssignment?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **condition** property from the [unifiedRoleAssignment](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/unifiedRoleAssignment?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **directoryScopeId** property from the [unifiedRoleAssignment](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/unifiedRoleAssignment?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **principalId** property from the [unifiedRoleAssignment](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/unifiedRoleAssignment?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **resourceScope** property from the [unifiedRoleAssignment](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/unifiedRoleAssignment?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **roleDefinitionId** property from the [unifiedRoleAssignment](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/unifiedRoleAssignment?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **appScope** relationship from the [unifiedRoleAssignment](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/unifiedRoleAssignment?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **directoryScope** relationship from the [unifiedRoleAssignment](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/unifiedRoleAssignment?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **principal** relationship from the [unifiedRoleAssignment](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/unifiedRoleAssignment?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **roleDefinition** relationship from the [unifiedRoleAssignment](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/unifiedRoleAssignment?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **id** property from the [unifiedRbacResourceNamespace](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/unifiedRbacResourceNamespace?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **name** property from the [unifiedRbacResourceNamespace](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/unifiedRbacResourceNamespace?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **resourceActions** relationship from the [unifiedRbacResourceNamespace](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/unifiedRbacResourceNamespace?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **activateService** method from the [organization](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/organization?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **legacyAllowAccessTo** relationship to the [group](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **legacyHasAccessTo** relationship to the [group](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **legacyPendingMembers** relationship to the [group](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the [reprocessLicenseAssignment](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/group-reprocessLicenseAssignment?view=graph-rest-beta) method to the [group](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **disabledByMicrosoftStatus** property from the [application](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/application?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **disabledByMicrosoftStatus** property from the [servicePrincipal](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/servicePrincipal?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
